comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: And he's not even breastfeeding his shovel?  Is that a whole hole or a half a hole he's dug??? Great image by the way, I doubt he ever thought his image would be saved for posterity!

comment.author: 38896199@N06
comment._content: If he thought it would be viewed in years to come he just might have got the finger out...

comment.author: 44124402046@N01
comment._content: He looks rather small compared to that doorway

comment.author: 55597723@N02
comment._content: Nice photo of a hard working & handsome young man. Very nice place in progress.

comment.author: 54708393@N08
comment._content: And not a power tool in sight!!.

comment.author: 23885771@N03
comment._content: What a shame they dug a trench right through that lovely tiled floorway - not that the workman would have noticed anyway! But then again, perhaps the tiled floorway would have been swept away as part of the 'alterations'?

comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/pedro1641] Well, it must be the slowest bank raid in history then! :D
